org.jLOAF.preprocessing.standardization

Class Standardization

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jLOAF.preprocessing.filter.CaseBaseFilter
      • org.jLOAF.preprocessing.standardization.Standardization

  • public class Standardization
extends CaseBaseFilter
    This function will take a CaseBase and normalize each feature (Column) to zero mean and unit variance.
    Author:
    sachagunaratne
